cause.title: RESERVATIONS
cause.p: The app will not allow me to reserve the specific time that I want.

step.cmd: If you are unable to reserve a time, it is likely because someone else has already reserved that specific time. Our system has a built in calendar that has times availible listed, so please see that list for the next available time.

cause.title: REGISTRATION
cause.p: The app will not allow me to register when I enter my account creation information.

step.cmd: The service does not allow you to register if you are below the age of 19, or do not have an attached and reviewed resume, you will be prevented from registering.
step.info: This is likely taking place because you had one of your students sign up for the class instead of siging up yourself, no shortcuts!
